label: 八条院
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This daughter of retired emperor Toba (1103-1156) and Bifukumon'in (1117-60) was particularly famous for the massive landholdings she received from her parents, though she was also a devout Buddhist, having become a nun in 1157 at the age of 21. She died in 1211.
